title: PLEASE HELP ME, RIOT
body:
I didn't do anything last night and I always doing good during games. But when I log in the game it showed my account has been suspend.
I don't know why u guys do that, I didn't do anything I promise.
And, I didn't received any email from RIOT.
Did u guys make some mistake? At least tell me why? I'm a good player.
If u guys suspend my account ,at least tell me why and send me email, please.
I'm so mad, i love this game but u guys doing that for me .

replies.body: Due to the nature of sensitive account information, we can't really help with this on the boards.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can offer context as well work with you towards getting this resolved.  We'll reply back asap!
My friend have the same problem..
